ThingDef.description: Webbing is a strong fabric woven as a flat strip or tube of varying width and fibres, often used in place of rope. It is a versatile component used in climbing, slacklining, furniture manufacturing, automobile safety, auto racing, towing, parachuting, military apparel, load securing, and many other fields.\n\nThis variant is an M56 webbing configured to the style of the Vietnam war era.
ThingDef.label: M56 webbing

It is a versatile component used in climbing, slacklining, furniture manufacturing, automobile safety, auto racing, towing, parachuting, military apparel, load securing, and many other fields.\n\nThis variant is an ALICE webbing configured to the style of the cold war era.
ThingDef.label: ALICE webbing

ThingDef.description: Webbing is a strong fabric woven as a flat strip or tube of varying width and fibres, often used in place of rope. It is a versatile component used in climbing, slacklining, furniture manufacturing, automobile safety, auto racing, towing, parachuting, military apparel, load securing, and many other fields.\n\nThis variant of battle belt rig is from Maxpedition labelled "Sabrecat".

ThingDef.description: Webbing is a strong fabric woven as a flat strip or tube of varying width and fibres, often used in place of rope. It is a versatile component used in climbing, slacklining, furniture manufacturing, automobile safety, auto racing, towing, parachuting, military apparel, load securing, and many other fields.\n\nThis variant of battle belt rig is from Condor complete with custom mag pouches, magazine dump pouch, first aid kit pouch and osprey utility pouches.
